name: Johnny Copeland
description:
'''John Clyde Copeland''' (March 27, 1937 â€“ July 3, 1997) was an American [[Texas blues]] guitarist and singer. In 1983, he was named Blues Entertainer of the Year by the [[Blues Foundation]]. He is the father of blues singer [[Shemekia Copeland]].

In 2017, Copeland was posthumously inducted into the [[Blues Hall of Fame]].
